title: The Climb:  Optimizing Your Jungle Clear
body:
http://i.imgur.com/yXgeELW.jpg


Which jungle monsters should you target first in each camp? The answer may surprise you. In this video, Foxdrop shows how optimizing your kill order makes a dramatic difference in reducing the damage you take, so you’re available for ganks and objectives instead of wasting time going b!


               https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PprdclQwC84


What tricks do you use to optimize your jungle clear? Let us know in the comments below, and please recommend your favorite community guides or videos! 

**About the Educator**

Foxdrop has been playing LoL since Season 1, reaching Diamond in Season 2. He began his YouTube channel in October 2012 and it has grown to over 400 videos, blending League strategy with a healthy amount of British humor.


Learn more about Foxdrop through the links below:

* [Follow Foxdrop on Twitter](https://twitter.com/Foxdroplol)

* [Foxdrop’s YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/user/foxdropLoL) 
* [Foxdrop’s Facebook Page](https://www.facebook.com/Foxdroplol)

replies.body: So... When I'm attacking dragon should I focus the dragon?
I know it might be a bit confusing but yeah, always focus dragon down first.
What if scuttler walks by? Which is better?
Then you just retreat; you are outmatched and overrun.
HE FORGOT THE SCUTTLE CRAB!!!!!
Damn, knew I forgot something!
Or as I like to call it, Nunu's free Max Potion.
Now i just need to figure out how to gank

You have two options HaGuy:

- Becomes a jungle Taric main, walk in to lane and press E;

- Watch my "3 tips to improve your ganking" video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bOFvPUrAnTE

Good luck soldier!
Ahh. Always nice to see people who know how to use their long hard objects xD
Taric Jung <3
His stick-figure intro is so painfully bad
Hey now YOU TAKE THAT BACK
Well the truth is you buy {{item:3725}} {{item:3721}} {{item:3717}} or {{item:3709}}  and then you win
Even Cinderhulk couldn't make Poacher's Knife good!
an afk enemy jungler makes poachers knife good.
God I love Foxdrop's humor.  Daily dose of Brit
U BLUDDY WUT MAYT???

I like Foxdrop videos. 

Also Stonewall008 and Jeremy "Gaming Curios" - Guides and Top 10's
And I like you too, buddy.
First time seeing your youtube videos, have you a twitch?

TL:DW: If you plan to smite a camp, focus the big monster. Otherwise, when taking down individual camps....

* Small golem before big golem (Krugs)
* Big Red before small golems
* Small raptors before big raptor


* Big wolf before small wolves
* Big blue before small golems
* Gromp and Skuttle crab are simply a pain regardless

TL;DR TL;DW

- Focus minis on krugs/chickens
ayy lmao "killing ur mum."
On {{champion:121}}  i always kill the little ones first so i get the big one isolated for that little dose of extra dmg on q.
Kha'zix is a unique case because of his isolation, but yeah - kill the minis first!
Foxdrop is all you need to {{champion:86}} tee {{champion:112}} {{champion:11}}
Foxdrop made jungle accessible to all of those "Mid or Feed" people. God Save the Queen. Keep up the great work.
Thanks Drooiidd! Glad you like em.

Fox drips im a jg {{champion:4}} master and i was wondering if you would think {{champion:13}}  jg would work out, have you ever gotten {{item:3711}} for the 15 second smites? real men dont need rangers if they played season 4

The problem I see which Ryze jungle is that he'd need a lot of time to ramp up and be useful. In the mean time he'd provide very little pressure, be very susceptible to invades or counter ganks, and probably struggle to efficiently clear at all. Similar to Vlad.

What's that item you showed there? Grey smite? To my knowledge no such item exists... {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}}
wtf who do I focus first in scuttle to take less damage
Well, as scuttler is very similar to gromp, having no small minions with it, I'd say you'd want to focus the scuttle crab itself first to avoid focusing something less important (i.e. nothing)

This will help with my clears! :D

But which river should I focus first.
If youère pretty low after starting ''exemple'' gromp then blue, then take Crab since it give you Health and meanwhile you regen. If you ain't low, then go straight to Wolfes then blabla and blabla.
Which blabla should I focus first? THERE'S TWO OMG WHY

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=ER5sX6rm,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-06-11T19:24:19.576+0000)
>
> wtf who do I focus first in scuttle to take less damage

Always focus ADC
no, focus the bush in the river obviously
He forgot red buff....{{item:3070}}
It's similar to blue! Doesn't matter too much.
Well that's the thing i wanted to know, as i'm not a jungler by any means, Thanks.
What if the jungler is AoE AND single target...{{champion:122}}? In this case which is better? killing minis or the big guy?

I'd get the minis down to low enough health that your AoE will finish them off within the next few seconds. That's usually a good balance of optimising the clear speed while also not taking too much damage for leaving minis up too long.
Thank you so much Foxdrop. Time for me to subscribe =)
Yay welcome bro!
WHAT THE HECK FOXDROP!!! YOU FORGOT SKUTTLE CRAB!!!
Foxdrop has always been my number 1 source for jungling and made me a jg main
lol Foxdrop is great :P
YOU'RE great!
